sources.title: Testament | Full Movie | Award Winning Fantasy Drama
sources.description:
Testament - In a world of corruption and destruction, it is hard to have faith for the future. The government has a lack of care for the people, with the rich living in luxury and the poor being unattended. However, the people are starting to rise up, and create a movement to protest the government, the people look to Simon to save them, and he goes on a quest to the city in order to restore order to the world. Told in two paralleling timelines, Testament highlights Simonâ€™s past of being a fisherman to the current events.
2017.  Stars: Demi Castro, Rachel Comeau, Jose Miguel Vasquez

metadata.Plot: Nuclear war in the United States is portrayed in a realistic and believable manner. The story is told through the eyes of a woman who is struggling to take care of her family. The entire movie takes place in a small suburban town outside San Francisco. After the nuclear attack, contact with the outside world is pretty much cut off.
metadata.Actors: Jane Alexander, William Devane, Rossie Harris
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 2 wins & 6 nominations total
